data.name: Shape
desc: This abstract service specifies the general characteristics of all Shapes.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

types.name: InteropGrabBag
desc: Grab bag of shape properties, used as a string-any map for interim interop purposes.
This property is intentionally not handled by the ODF filter. Any member that should be handled there should be first moved out from this grab bag to a separate property.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: Hyperlink
desc: this property lets you get and set a hyperlink for this shape.

properties.name: LayerID
desc: This is the ID of the Layer to which this Shape is attached.

properties.name: LayerName
desc: This is the name of the Layer to which this Shape is attached.

properties.name: MoveProtect
desc: With this set to TRUE, this Shape cannot be moved interactively in the user interface.

properties.name: Name
desc: This is the name of this Shape.

properties.name: NavigationOrder
desc: this property stores the navigation order of this shape.
If this value is negative, the navigation order for this shapes page is equal to the z-order.

properties.name: Printable
desc: If this is FALSE, the Shape is not visible on printer outputs.

properties.name: RelativeHeight
desc: contains the relative height of the object.
It is only valid if it is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: RelativeHeightRelation
desc: contains the relation of the relative height of the object.
It is only valid if RelativeHeight is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: RelativeWidth
desc: contains the relative width of the object.
It is only valid if it is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: RelativeWidthRelation
desc: contains the relation of the relative width of the object.
It is only valid if RelativeWidth is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: ShapeUserDefinedAttributes
desc: this property stores xml attributes.
They will be saved to and restored from automatic styles inside xml files.

properties.name: SizeProtect
desc: With this set to TRUE, this Shape may not be sized interactively in the user interface.

properties.name: Style
desc: this property lets you get and set a style for this shape.

properties.name: Transformation
desc: this property lets you get and set the transformation matrix for this shape.
The transformation is a 3x3 homogeneous matrix and can contain translation, rotation, shearing and scaling.

properties.name: Visible
desc: If this is FALSE, the Shape is not visible on screen outputs.
Please note that the Shape may still be visible when printed, see Printable.

properties.name: ZOrder
desc: is used to query or change the ZOrder of this Shape.
